title: Who watches me at night on Google? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, it’s my fair guess, but I hate to tell you the answer & that is NOBODY is watching you. Did you expect any company coming over? As far as I know, Google is pretty tied up with global issues to deal with & not so much to spy on us. Hope this can help you. Pleezzzz take care!
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Rafay Hussain Sabri
